topic.title: Show DITA Task Steps in Separate Tabs

body.p: You can present individual DITA task steps in separate tabs in the generated WebHelp output using this free plugin: .
Suppose you have a DITA task containing steps like:<steps> <step> <cmd>Begin by cutting out all the dead branches.</cmd> </step> .... <step> <cmd>Clean up the area.</cmd> </step> </steps>

You can install this open-source DITA Open Toolkit plugin to display steps as separate tabs in the published WebHelp output: . To enable generating separate tabs for each DITA task step, you also need to set the publising parameter tabs.for.steps to value true.
